game.name: The Battle for Vega
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Inspired by the classic Space Invaders, The Battle for Vega takes the old-school gameplay you know and love and adds new features that make it a fresh and exciting experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Inspired by the classic Space Invaders, The Battle for Vega takes the old-school gameplay you know and love and adds new features that make it a fresh and exciting experience.
